template<typename T >
__host__ __device__ thrust::system::cuda::experimental::pinned_allocator< T >::pinned_allocator ( pinned_allocator< T > const &  ) [inline]

pinned_allocator's copy constructor does nothing.

template<typename T >
template<typename U >
__host__ __device__ thrust::system::cuda::experimental::pinned_allocator< T >::pinned_allocator ( pinned_allocator< U > const &  ) [inline]

This version of pinned_allocator's copy constructor is templated on the value_type of the pinned_allocator to copy from. It is provided merely for convenience; it does nothing.

template<typename T >
__host__ pointer thrust::system::cuda::experimental::pinned_allocator< T >::allocate ( size_type  cnt,
const_pointer  = 0 
) [inline]

This method allocates storage for objects in pinned host memory.

cnt The number of objects to allocate.

Returns:
a pointer to the newly allocated objects.
Note:
This method does not invoke value_type's constructor. It is the responsibility of the caller to initialize the objects at the returned pointer.

References thrust::system::cuda::experimental::pinned_allocator< T >::max_size().

template<typename T >
__host__ void thrust::system::cuda::experimental::pinned_allocator< T >::deallocate ( pointer  p,
size_type  cnt 
) [inline]

This method deallocates pinned host memory previously allocated with this pinned_allocator.

p A pointer to the previously allocated memory. cnt The number of objects previously allocated at p.

Note:
This method does not invoke value_type's destructor. It is the responsibility of the caller to destroy the objects stored at p.

References thrust::system::cuda_category().

template<typename T >
size_type thrust::system::cuda::experimental::pinned_allocator< T >::max_size ( void  ) const [inline]

This method returns the maximum size of the cnt parameter accepted by the allocate() method.

Returns:
The maximum number of objects that may be allocated by a single call to allocate().

Referenced by thrust::system::cuda::experimental::pinned_allocator< T >::allocate().

This method tests this pinned_allocator for inequality to another.

Parameters:
